node.snippet: In the last part I talked about various ways of representing word as vectors in NLP. However, most state-of-the-art models (as of 2020 anyway) do not even care about word vectors at all! So what happened?

frontmatter.title: A history of progress on text representation in NLP (Part 2 - Sentence-level representation)

node.snippet: In this article, I will outline through some of the most popular breakthroughs in AI in a semi-chronological order, with hope to inspire people on diving in deeper and experiment more, maybe even revisit old techniques and apply on top of newer architectures.

frontmatter.title: A history of progress on text representation in NLP (Part 1 - Word-level representation)

node.snippet: Stay tuned for more updates, and have a nice day!
